bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Hi

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Who is this?

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: You don’t know me but I have important news to give you

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Is this a Joke?

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: No, fortunately for you

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Martin Ratinaud is looking for a job

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message:
What?
Who is this?

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message:
He’s a full stack developer who has expatriated in Mauritius
His current company is running out of fund after raising 2M$

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Sad story

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message:
Ok and why should I care?
Who are you anyway?I’m gonna hang up

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: You’re gonna like what comes next

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He’s surely the guy you’re looking for

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: and why is that, I already have a 1000 resumes from people in the Valley, getting out of Facebook and Netflix.

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: I don’t have time for this.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He may not have all those big names on his resume, I agree, but his current and former teammates all agree he’s great to work with, skilled and very creative

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Look at his linked recommandations

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: No kidding, like half of the resumes I get

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Let me tell you

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: You need skills in React

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He has created 3 web platforms over the past 3 years. From scratch.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: First is a social network for artists to get the money they deserve from their creation.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: They got 50000 artists

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: That’s fair for artists but not a lot of trend

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Second is a trading platform for royalties

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: They have sold 300k$ of copyrights and first royalty payment has just been made

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: The guy even owns 1% of the latest « Father of Chinese rock »’s song!

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Ok Nice, he likes music then

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Yes but his guitar skills are pretty low. He hardly plays « Layla » and « Nothing else Matters »

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: He needs practice :-)

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: This, of course, has been developed with microservices interconnected with gRPC and deployed on Google Cloud services

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: And it uses real time updates with RabbitMQ and graphQL subscriptions

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Ok, that’s the kind of technology we could use

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Right, you begin to see where I’m going

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: The third project is the last tool artist will ever need to record their live sessions

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: It’s live on IndieGogo now and it is called the Reclouder

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Reclouder…

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Recorder in the cloud

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Thanks for the explanation…..

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Ok Sorry

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Ok, he’s skilled, he can build stuff, like anybody who applies to this job, what makes him a unique fit

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Glad you asked

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: For all these projects, he’s been part of the product creation, the planning making and has supervised 3 senior developers (1 iOS, 1 Android and 1 Fullstack)

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Also, You’re looking for remote right

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Yes

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He’s been working remotely for 3 years.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: His team is spread across Europe, Asia and US, surely like yours, so he knows the drill.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He was in France first and then expatriated with his whole family to Mauritius

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Mauritius, lucky him!

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: That’s for sure, but do you know how he found where to go?

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Is this relevant to our conversation?

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Yes :-)

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He wanted a place where he could surf and where his wife and kids could practice their favorite sport - horse riding - while learning english

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Not easy to find indeed

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: That’s why he created a website to find it

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: really?

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Yes.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: As a side project, he built https://www.remote-family.com and found out his sweet spot would be in Tamarin, Mauritius

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Ok, the guy knows what he wants

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Indeed!

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: And finally one last thing

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Yes

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: He’s run his own company of 12 people during 7 years and sold it in 2014.

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: You need entrepreneurship spirit, autonomy and a sharp and concise way of solving problems

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: The guy seems to have done that all his career

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: You’re served

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Ok that looks nice, I will contact him then

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Now is my time to ask one question

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Sure

bubbles.name: You
bubbles.message: Who are you?

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: Well

bubbles.name: Unknown
bubbles.message: I’m

finish.title: Martin Ratinaud
finish.subtitle: Here is a glimpse of my work and how to contact me
